languages.text: "Инквизиции известно, что Вистенца Вьятт много лет назад подпала под влияние еретиков, проникших в ее свиту, и исповедует богохульные верования, нашептанные Архиврагом. Ваше решение не предпринимать мер по этому вопросу было напрасным. Что же, я приму их сам".

"The Inquisition knows that it has been many years since Vistenza Vyatt fell under the influence of the heretics who insinuated themselves into her entourage, and that she has adopted the blasphemous beliefs whispered to her by the Archenemy. Your decision to take no action in this matter was folly. I will simply have to see to it myself."
languages.original_text: "Инквизиции известно, что Вистенца Вьятт много лет назад подпала под влияние еретиков, проникших в ее свиту, и исповедует богохульные верования, нашептанные Архиврагом. Ваше решение не предпринимать мер по этому вопросу было напрасным. Что же, я приму их сам".

traits.locale_text: "The Inquisition knows that it has been many years since Vistenza Vyatt fell under the influence of heretics who had insinuated themselves into her entourage, and accepted the blasphemous beliefs whispered to her by the Archenemy. Your decision to take no action in this matter was folly. I will simply have to take it myself."

Your decision to take no action in this matter was folly. I will simply have to take it myself."

Your decision to take no action in this matter was folly. I will simply have to see to it myself."

Your decision to take no action in this matter was folly. I will simply have to see to it myself."

languages.text: 「ヴィステンツァ・ビャットがその取り巻きに潜り込んだ異端の影響下に堕ち、渾沌の勢力に耳打ちされた不敬な考えに同調してから何年も経っていることを、異端審問庁は把握済みだ。この問題に何の対処もしないというお前の決定は愚劣だ。私自ら、執行しなくてはならぬ」
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition knows that it has been many years since Vistenza Vyatt fell under the influence of the heretics who insinuated themselves into her entourage, and that she has adopted the blasphemous beliefs whispered to her by the Archenemy. Your decision to take no action in this matter was folly. I will simply have to see to it myself."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴィステンツァ・ビャットがその取り巻きに潜り込んだ異端の影響下に堕ち、渾沌の勢力に耳打ちされた不敬な考えに同調してから何年も経っていることを、異端審問庁は把握済みだ。この問題に何の対処もしないというお前の決定は愚劣だ。私自ら、執行しなくてはならぬ」

languages.original_text: "The Inquisition knows that it has been many years since Vistenza Vyatt fell under the influence of the heretics who insinuated themselves into her entourage, and that she has adopted the blasphemous beliefs whispered to her by the Archenemy. Your decision to take no action in this matter was folly. I will simply have to see to it myself."

languages.text: “审判庭已经得知，异端分子多年前就渗透到了维丝坦萨·维亚特的随行人员之中，她也一直在受到那些异端分子的影响。她已经听信了混沌大敌的低语，改信了亵渎神明的邪教。你对她的放任自流无疑是愚蠢的，我不得不亲自来处理这件事。”
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition knows that it has been many years since Vistenza Vyatt fell under the influence of the heretics who insinuated themselves into her entourage, and that she has adopted the blasphemous beliefs whispered to her by the Archenemy. Your decision to take no action in this matter was folly. I will simply have to see to it myself."

traits.locale_text: “审判庭已经得知，异端分子多年前就渗透到了维丝坦萨·维亚特的随行人员之中，她也一直在受到那些异端分子的影响。她已经听信了混沌大敌的低语，改信了亵渎神明的邪教。你对她的放任自流无疑是愚蠢的，我不得不亲自来处理这件事。”

languages.text: «La Inquisición sabe que ya hace muchos años que Vistenza Vyatt cayó bajo la influencia de los herejes que se infiltraron en su séquito y que ha adoptado las creencias blasfemas que le susurra el Archienemigo. Su decisión de no intervenir en el asunto es una insensatez. Tendré que ocuparme personalmente».
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition knows that it has been many years since Vistenza Vyatt fell under the influence of the heretics who insinuated themselves into her entourage, and that she has adopted the blasphemous beliefs whispered to her by the Archenemy. Your decision to take no action in this matter was folly. I will simply have to see to it myself."

traits.locale_text: «La Inquisición sabe que ya hace muchos años que Vistenza Vyatt cayó bajo la influencia de los herejes que se infiltraron en su séquito y que ha adoptado las creencias blasfemas que le susurra el Archienemigo. Su decisión de no intervenir en el asunto es una insensatez. Tendré que ocuparme personalmente».

languages.text: « L'Inquisition sait depuis des années que Vistenza Vyatt est sous l'influence des hérétiques qui sont parvenus à s'infiltrer dans son entourage et qu'elle a embrassé les croyances blasphématoires que le Grand Ennemi lui susurre à l'oreille. Vous avez été bien {mf|malavisé|malavisée} de ne pas prendre les mesures adéquates sur-le-champ. Il faudra donc que je m'en charge moi-même. »
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition knows that it has been many years since Vistenza Vyatt fell under the influence of the heretics who insinuated themselves into her entourage, and that she has adopted the blasphemous beliefs whispered to her by the Archenemy. Your decision to take no action in this matter was folly. I will simply have to see to it myself."

traits.locale_text: « L'Inquisition sait depuis des années que Vistenza Vyatt est sous l'influence des hérétiques qui sont parvenus à s'infiltrer dans son entourage et qu'elle a embrassé les croyances blasphématoires que le Grand Ennemi lui susurre à l'oreille. Vous avez été bien {mf|malavisé|malavisée} de ne pas prendre les mesures adéquates sur-le-champ. Il faudra donc que je m'en charge moi-même. »

languages.text: "Die Inquisition weiß, dass Vistenza Vyatt schon vor vielen Jahren unter den Einfluss der Ketzer geriet, die sich in ihr Gefolge eingeschlichen hatten, und dass sie den blasphemischen Glauben übernommen hat, den der Erzfeind ihr eingeflüstert hat. Eure Entscheidung, in dieser Sache nicht aktiv zu werden, war dumm. Ich werde mich selbst darum kümmern müssen."
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition knows that it has been many years since Vistenza Vyatt fell under the influence of the heretics who insinuated themselves into her entourage, and that she has adopted the blasphemous beliefs whispered to her by the Archenemy. Your decision to take no action in this matter was folly. I will simply have to see to it myself."

traits.locale_text: "Die Inquisition weiß, dass Vistenza Vyatt schon vor vielen Jahren unter den Einfluss der Ketzer geriet, die sich in ihr Gefolge eingeschlichen hatten, und dass sie den blasphemischen Glauben übernommen hat, den der Erzfeind ihr eingeflüstert hat. Eure Entscheidung, in dieser Sache nicht aktiv zu werden, war dumm. Ich werde mich selbst darum kümmern müssen."

languages.text: "Engizisyon; Vistenza Vyatt'ın, maiyetine sızmayı başarmış kâfirlerin etkisi altında olduğunun ve Şerbaşı'nın onun kulağına fısıldadığı din dışı inançları benimsediğinin yıllardır farkındaydı. Bu konuda eyleme geçmeme kararın budalalıktı. Şimdi meseleyle bizzat ilgilenmem gerekecek."
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition knows that it has been many years since Vistenza Vyatt fell under the influence of the heretics who insinuated themselves into her entourage, and that she has adopted the blasphemous beliefs whispered to her by the Archenemy. Your decision to take no action in this matter was folly. I will simply have to see to it myself."

traits.locale_text: "Engizisyon, Vistenza Vyatt'ın, maiyetine sızmayı başarmış kâfirlerin etkisi altında olduğunun ve ona Şerbaşı tarafından fısıldanan din dışı inançları benimsediğinin yıllardır farkındaydı. Bu konuda eyleme geçmeme kararın budalalıktı. Bizzat kendim ilgilenmem gerekecek."
